attributes.action: Make it mandatory for all football clubs participating in the Premier League and the Football League to submit full financial statements under International Financial Reporting Standards.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Make it mandatory for all football clubs participating in the Premier League and the Football League to submit full financial statements under International Financial Reporting Standards to make activities of every clubs to become transparent to the public in the interests of the supporters.

Recent cases of corruption & mismanagement have frustrated the fans of the popular game. Examples would include the suspect transfer of Argentinean players to West Ham, poor management of Luton FC, the allegation of corruption involving Bolton and Portsmouth in recent BBC documentaries.

It is in the interest of the government to stump out corruption in businesses and interest of fans to be kept informed, as both are interested and influential parties to the clubs within their respective leagues.
